experiment.name: Transcription profiling by array of Arabidopsis mutant for pil5 after exposure to red and far-red light or far-red light only

description.text: PIL5 is a key negative regulator of phytochrome mediated seed germination and PIL5 protein is degraded by red light irradiation through phytochrome. The microarray aimed to find various red light-regulated genes and PIL5-regulated genes in the imbibed seeds. Experiment Overall Design: Col-0 and pil5 seeds were irradiated by far-red light or far-red/red light and then, incubated in the dark for 12 hours. Total three biological replicates were used for the microarray.

bibliography.authors: Oh E, Kang H, Yamaguchi S, Park J, Lee D, Kamiya Y, Choi G.
bibliography.title: Genome-wide analysis of genes targeted by PHYTOCHROME INTERACTING FACTOR 3-LIKE5 during seed germination in Arabidopsis.
